daily_activities: Sightseeing: Visit the Triveni Sangam, a confluence of three rivers
Dining: Try local cuisine at a traditional restaurant
Adventure Sports: Go rafting or kayaking in the Ganges River
Nightlife: Explore the city's nightlife at a rooftop bar
Museums: Visit the Allahabad Museum to learn about the city's history
Shopping: Shop for local handicrafts and souvenirs at the Civil Lines Market
Hiking: Take a hike to the nearby Kausambi ruins
Sightseeing: Visit the Anand Bhavan, a historic house museum
Dining: Take a food tour to sample local street food
Nightlife: Enjoy a cultural performance at a local theater
Sightseeing: Visit the Allahabad Fort, a historic fort built by the Mughal Empire
Adventure Sports: Go on a bike tour of the city
Shopping: Visit the Chowk Market for a unique shopping experience
Museums: Visit the Jawahar Planetarium to learn about astronomy

travel_instructions.route_details: The most common route is to take a train from Ahmedabad Junction (ADI) to Prayagraj Junction (PRYJ) via the Ahmedabad - Howrah or Ahmedabad - Varanasi route
